Address.label: Address
Address.value: 700 S. LEWIS AVENUE, WAUKEGAN, Illinois, 60085, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: NSTS Bancorp Inc is a savings and loan holding company regulated Federal Reserve Board. The company was formed to serve as the North Shore Trust and Savings stock holding company. The Bank is a wholly-owned subsidiary of the company and operates as a traditional savings institution focused primarily on serving the banking needs of customers in our market area of Lake County, Illinois and adjacent communities.
